title: I was banned for what?
body:
Is this bannable?

Game 1
Pre-Game
EZ 4 M3: fägeti fäg
In-Game
EZ 4 M3: suck my dick you fuckin %%%%%% %%%%%%s
EZ 4 M3: fuckin %%%%%%s i hate you
EZ 4 M3: suck a dick
EZ 4 M3: worst draven ive ever seen in my life lol
EZ 4 M3: ggg

replies.body: This is absolutely bannable, as those words that appear censored on the boards are homophobic hate speech. This sort of behavior leads to a 14-day ban on the first offense, and a permanent ban on subsequent offenses.
Don't waste your time here. You know yourself why.
Yeah, why even ask? i mean... everything you said there is punishable
I mean....... I can't even comment on this.
Please tell me this is a joke

Asking someone to do you a blowjob in a game is perfectly normal.I've seen it in many games.Dont understand why would you even THINK its bannable.










No sarcasm was used in the making of this comment.
Honestly if you replaced the negativity you mentioned above with cuddles or happiness riot still woulda banned you.
